short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display your typing speed (wpm) in real-time on any textbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Change wpm widget position
- Change background color
- Change background opacity
- Change text color
- Change font size
- Change wpm hide delay

Security & Privacy:
- The TypeTrack extension does not collect, store, or transmit any personal data or user content.
- The extension only tracks keystrokes within the confines of active text fields, with no access to other types of data on the page.
- No keystrokes are stored, collected, or transmitted.
